item.title: Ivy add a quote by E. B. White
item.description: "I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve (or save) the world and a desire to enjoy (or savor) the world. This makes it hard to plan the day." -- E. B. White

item.title: Ivy add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Ivy add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Faith is taking the first step even when you can't see the whole staircase." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Ivy add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Ivy add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Nothing in the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Ivy add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character." -- Martin Luther King Jr.
